Text: Enrons Master Firm Sales Agreement Cc Debra I have briefly discussed some of the issues concerning the changes we feel are appropriate with your diversity program Ms Hunter Mr Eakins Ms Medcalf They were interested about in my reasoning behind the suggested changes I realize their could or will be different verbiage concerning my changes however the intent is firm because of the standard GISB payment dates previously agreed upon as well as anticipated payment date for other Resale Customers I am assuming there is little room for negotiation as the agreement format requirement of the Buyer Please advise me of your comments concerning the changes so as we can move forward I have been asked to keep the Diversity people informed of my progress so I am copying Ms Hunter on this EMail Thanks and I look forward to hearing from you Pamela Maxwell Constellation Management Services Enrons WMBE Agreedoc
